description: This is an Angular component for the dashboard page of a habit tracker application. It handles displaying habits, progress summary, and manages UI interactions such as opening dialogs and toggling habits.

classes.name: DashboardComponent
classes.description: Angular component for displaying the habit tracker dashboard, including habit list, progress summary, and controlled dialogs.

methods.name: openAdd
methods.description: Sets the signal to show the add habit dialog.

methods.name: closeAdd
methods.description: Closes the add habit dialog by resetting the signal.

methods.name: createHabit
methods.description: Calls the habit service to add a new habit and closes the dialog.

methods.name: toggleHabit
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a habit for today via the habit service.
